text: (Yaa Muhammad!) rahmata Rabbi irraa ta’een isaaniif laafteOdoo ati nama haala gadheefi qalbii gogaa taatee silaa si biraa faca’uIrra isaaniif darbi; isaaniifis araarama kadhu; dhimmoota (adda addaa) irrattis isaan mari’achiisiYeroo murattes Rabbirratti hirkadhuDhugumatti, Rabbiin warra (Isa) irratti hirkatan ni jaalata
